sentence: Wednesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 6,352.33.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.05 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 2.48 to 1 ratio.
There were 856 advancers and 2126 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 25 stocks reached a 52 week high and 71 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.12% for the day; a total of -6.96 points.
DENTSPLY SIRONA Inc. ( XRAY ) had the largest percent change down (-8.44%) while Liberty Interactive Corporation ( QVCA ) had the largest percent change gain rising 4.25%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.17% for the day; a total of -36.64 points.
Walt Disney Company (The) ( DIS ) had the largest percent change down (-3.88%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.25%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
